forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain developing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain developing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 60F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 65F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
